com.norconex.collector.http.fetch.util

Class TrustAllX509TrustManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.net.ssl.X509ExtendedTrustManager
      • com.norconex.collector.http.fetch.util.TrustAllX509TrustManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrustManager, X509TrustManager

    public class TrustAllX509TrustManager
extends X509ExtendedTrustManager
    A very unsafe trust manager accepting ALL certificates. This includes ones with encryption algorithms deemed unsafe, self-signed, etc.
    Since:
    2.4.0
    Author:
    Pascal Essiembre
